title: Hand script font id
content:
Can anyone identify this hand drawn script font and where I can find it? Thanks

Font: 

 Weisbaden Swing 

Solved By: 

 [Birdseeding](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414142400/http:/typophile.com/user/88704 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font id2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414142400/http:/typophile.com/files/font%20id2.jpg) | 62.72 KB |
author: creativeliz

comments.content: [Weisbaden Swing](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414142400/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/wiesbadenswing/). Tip: next time link to the source of the text! It helps immensely. In this case it's a webfont on a website ( [http://www.festiveproducts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414142400/http:/www.festiveproducts.com/ "http://www.festiveproducts.com")), which makes it super-easy to suss out.
Thank you and apologies, new to this, will do next time.
